EmailTemplate.subject: If You Think “Digital Transformation” is About Kubernetes, You’re Wrong
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
January 31, 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/digital-transformation-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> If You Think “Digital Transformation” is About Kubernetes, You’re Wrong Richard Seroter, Vice President of Marketing, on why digital transformation isn't just about technology, but rather, fostering a culture that frequently ships new software, craves customer feedback, iterates constantly, and delivers customer value. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/digital-transformation-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-to-run-pivotal-cloud-foundry-across-multiple-sites-we-compare-three-options?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How to Run Pivotal Cloud Foundry Across Multiple Sites When you decide to standardize all your enterprise application development on Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF), the immediate follow-up question is “how do I ensure this platform remains highly available and disaster resilient, at scale?” We Compare Three Options <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-to-run-pivotal-cloud-foundry-across-multiple-sites-we-compare-three-options?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-2018-diversity-inclusion-report?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal 2018 Diversity & Inclusion Report We've released our 2018 Diversity and Inclusion Report. Learn about the new programs we've initiated in the past year, and what's to come. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-2018-diversity-inclusion-report?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/using-software-to-improve-medication-adherence-with-shields-health-solutions?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Using Software to Improve Medication Adherence with Shields Health Solutions Dan Stevenson and Brandon Zaharoff of Shields Health Solutions join Jeff and Dormain to chat about the challenges of developing and running a specialty pharmacy, how Shields' software helps ensure patients are taking their medications as directed, and how and why Shields adopted cloud-native software development to build and evolve its flagship product, TelemetryRX. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/using-software-to-improve-medication-adherence-with-shields-health-solutions?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://youtu.be/B2x3NMCUzac> Rolling Updates with PCF 2.4 With the release of Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.4 comes some great new features. Take a look at the newly updated stack based on Ubuntu 18.04, internal domains, and a new exciting beta feature—rolling updates for your applications.
